response.overview: Little Minds on the Prairie is a documentary capturing life through the eyes of a filmmaker growing up in a restless generation. Filmed from 2010 through 2018, it weaves together personal stories, friendships, struggles, and dreams to create a vivid self-portrait of millennial life. Honest, reflective, and deeply human, the film invites viewers into an ever-changing world where identity, ambition, and belonging are constantly being redefined.
response.tagline: An intimate portrait of life on the edge of change.
response.title: Little Minds on the Prairie
